name: Dicetender
description:
Just sit, enjoy a coffee and play a game of dice and cards.

Meet bizarre characters from space and try to obtain some new fancy dice for your

Eyedward - They trade stonks

Mounthy - He's just handsome

---------------------------------------

Code & Game Design - Walter Cossu

Graphics - Guido Salto

All code and graphical assets made by us for the GMTK game jam
